original_text: And it came to pass after many days, that the word of the Lord came to Elijah in the third year, saying, Go, shew thyself unto Ahab; and I will send rain upon the earth.
korean_text: 많은 날이 지나고 제삼년에 여호와의 말씀이 엘리야에게 임하여 이르시되 너는 가서 아합에게 보이라 내가 비를 지면에 내리리라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after many days
that the word of the Lord came to Elijah
saying, Go, shew thyself unto Ahab
sentences.korean_translation: 이르시되, 가서 아합에게 너 자신을 보이라

sentences.original_text: and I will send rain upon the earth
